summary: Two young actresses fall in love with each other while filming a lesbian love scene, then break up months later, and then are forced to reunite in order to re-shoot the love scene for the movie's distribution.
cast: Sharon Hinnendael|Jill Evyn|Constance Brenneman|Marina Rice Bader|Kieran Valla|Alexandria Storm|Justin Kane
title: Anatomy of a Love Seen
